name: Dogstronauts
description:
Welcome to Dogstronauts!

A rogue asteroid has collided with your shuttlecraft! The crewmembers aboard have managed to make an emergency landing on a nearby moon. Cobbling together the salvage from the wreck, they have established a small base of operations. But now they need to work together to find a way back home... can you help them?

Dogstronauts is a casual base building/resource management/survival game featuring a crew of space dogs stranded on an alien moon! 
To succeed you will need to:
 - Gather resources and materials for crafting. 
 - Ensure your dogs' fun, food, and sleep needs are met.
 - Build new structures.
 - Research new technologies.
 
Dogstronauts was created for the 2020 Secret Santa Jam. 

NOTE: Unfortunately this game does not have a save/load feature. The completion time for a game can take ~1-2 hours, so settle in for a long session!

---------------------------------------------------------------

Features

  • Manage a crew of five loyal space dogs, ensuring that they get enough fun, food and sleep.
  • Explore a procedurally-generated map full of different resources to harvest.
  • Build structures that can craft complex materials, advance your technology, or boost your crewmembers needs.
  • Research new technologies that give you access to more advanced structures and materials.

---------------------------------------------------------------
